product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Polar Bear Ice Cream Sandwich - Single Serving
long_description: The delicious Backpacker's Pantry Polar Bear freeze-dried ice cream sandwich is ready to eat right out of the package. Backpacker's Pantry donates 1% if sales of the Polar Bear ice cream sandwich to the Defenders of Wildlife Polar Bear Adoption program. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The delicious Backpacker's Pantry Polar Bear freeze-dried ice cream sandwich is ready to eat right out of the package.
